name: 9! Factorial
description:
Halloween Game Jam Demo

October 31st 2094, in the near future, the rich left for Mars leaving behind an impoverished Earth economy. You're a new recruit in the agency 'Re-Fraction' sent to investigate Earth and eliminate a threat, the cult of Humanism. Somewhere in an abandoned Factory, there is another one of you, an Elza. Knowing all this, you keep it a secret from the boss, in any case your ideologies and alignment are shifting sides.

Disclaimer: contains strong language and suggestive themes. (13+)

(This is a fictional story, any characters referenced are purely fictional and in no way real representations of true people.)

Credits:

Rachel Chan - Abandoned Factory (Visual Novel Backgrounds)

Emanzi Kamugisha - Music, Characters, Writing & Code, SFX, GUI & Design.
